overview.en: UAGE Network, based on the characteristics of block chain technology, combines the basic modules of decentralized multi-dimensional verification system, intelligent contract, multi-source authentication protocol, distributed data collaboration, encryption communication technology, DAO community autonomy and other business fields to realize decentralized value network, and constructs cross-chain, cross-system, cross-industry, and inter-industry value network. Cross-application and cross-terminal distributed value network system provides decentralized solutions for various industries, and promotes large-scale block chain commercial applications landing. UAGE Network, as a new generation of de-centralized value network public chain platform, is committed to building an open source, public and collaborative de-centralized value network ecosystem.
overview.zh: UAGE Network 基于区块链技术的链网特性，结合了去中心化多维验证体系、智能合约、多源认证协议、分布式数据协同、加密通信技术、DAO 社区自治等业务领域的基础模块，实现去中心化的价值网络，构建跨链、跨系统、跨行业、跨应用和跨终端的分布式价值网络体系，为各行业提供去中心化解决方案，推动大规模区块链商业应用落地。UAGE Network作为新一代去中心化价值网络公有链平台，致力于建立一个开源、公共、协同的去中心化价值网络生态。
